001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.MinsTime;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSegmentRequest;
010
011import java.util.HashSet;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Set;
014
015/**
016 * If the segment index is invalid, returns ErrorResponse with INVALID_PARAMETER, which causes the
017 * pump to terminate the Bluetooth connection, so do NOT arbitrarily query for all segments.
018 *
019 * @see com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.InsulinDeliveryProfileRequestBuilder
020 */
021/**
022 * If the segment index is invalid, returns ErrorResponse with INVALID_PARAMETER, which causes the
023 * pump to terminate the Bluetooth connection, so do NOT arbitrarily query for all segments.
024 *
025 * @see com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.InsulinDeliveryProfileRequestBuilder
026 *
027
028 *
029 * <br>
030 *
031 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetIDPSegmentRequest}, opCode 67, size 15
032 *
033 * <br>
034 *
035 * 
036 * <table border='1'>
037 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>67</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>15</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
040 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
041 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetIDPSegmentRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
042 * </table>
043 */@MessageProps(
044    opCode=67,
045    size=15,
046    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
047    request=IDPSegmentRequest.class
048)
049public class IDPSegmentResponse extends Message {
050    
051    private int idpId;
052    private int segmentIndex;
053    private int profileStartTime;
054    private MinsTime profileProcessedStartTime;
055    private int profileBasalRate;
056    private long profileCarbRatio;
057    private int profileTargetBG;
058    private int profileISF;
059    private int idpStatusId;
060    private Set<IDPSegmentStatus> idpStatus;
061    
062    public IDPSegmentResponse() {}
063    
064    public IDPSegmentResponse(int idpId, int segmentIndex, int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF, int statusId) {
065        this.cargo = buildCargo(idpId, segmentIndex, profileStartTime, profileBasalRate, profileCarbRatio, profileTargetBG, profileISF, statusId);
066        this.idpId = idpId;
067        this.segmentIndex = segmentIndex;
068        this.profileStartTime = profileStartTime;
069        this.profileProcessedStartTime = new MinsTime(profileStartTime);
070        this.profileBasalRate = profileBasalRate;
071        this.profileCarbRatio = profileCarbRatio;
072        this.profileTargetBG = profileTargetBG;
073        this.profileISF = profileISF;
074        this.idpStatusId = statusId;
075        this.idpStatus = getIdpStatus();
076        
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * <table border="1">
081     * <caption>Parsed fields for IDPSegmentResponse:</caption>
082     * <tr><td><code>idpId</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
083     * <tr><td><code>segmentIndex</code></td><td><code>raw[1]</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td><code>profileStartTime</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 2)</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td><code>profileProcessedStartTime</code></td><td><code>new MinsTime(profileStartTime)</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td><code>profileBasalRate</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td><code>profileCarbRatio</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 6)</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td><code>profileTargetBG</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 10)</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td><code>profileISF</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 12)</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td><code>idpStatusId</code></td><td><code>raw[14]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td><code>idpStatus</code></td><td><code>getIdpStatus()</code></td></tr>
092     * </table>
093     */
094    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
095        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
096        this.cargo = raw;
097        this.idpId = raw[0];
098        this.segmentIndex = raw[1];
099        this.profileStartTime = Bytes.readShort(raw, 2);
100        this.profileProcessedStartTime = new MinsTime(profileStartTime);
101        this.profileBasalRate = Bytes.readShort(raw, 4);
102        this.profileCarbRatio = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 6);
103        this.profileTargetBG = Bytes.readShort(raw, 10);
104        this.profileISF = Bytes.readShort(raw, 12);
105        this.idpStatusId = raw[14];
106        this.idpStatus = getIdpStatus();
107        
108    }
109
110    
111    /**
112     * <table border="1">
113     * <caption>Byte layout for IDPSegmentResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
114     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
115     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) idpId</code></td></tr>
116     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>(byte) segmentIndex</code></td></tr>
117     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
118     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
119     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
120     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
121     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
122     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
123     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
124     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
125     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
126     * <tr><td>11</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
127     * <tr><td>12</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
128     * <tr><td>13</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
129     * <tr><td>14</td><td><code>(byte) idpStatusId</code></td></tr>
130     * </table>
131     */
132    public static byte[] buildCargo(int idpId, int segmentIndex, int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF, int idpStatusId) {
133        return Bytes.combine(
134            new byte[]{ (byte) idpId }, 
135            new byte[]{ (byte) segmentIndex }, 
136            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime), 
137            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate), 
138            Bytes.toUint32(profileCarbRatio), 
139            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG), 
140            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF), 
141            new byte[]{ (byte) idpStatusId });
142    }
143
144    /**
145     * @return ID of the insulin delivery profile in which this segment exists. Not to be confused with "slot"
146     */
147    public int getIdpId() {
148        return idpId;
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * @return 0-indexed spot in the segments list in which this segment occurs in the profile
153     */
154    public int getSegmentIndex() {
155        return segmentIndex;
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * @return start time of the profile segment. The profile segment runs from this time until the
160     * next-configured profile segment start time in this insulin delivery profile. Expressed in
161     * minutes since midnight, see {@link MinsTime} and {@link #getProfileProcessedStartTime()} helper.
162     *
163     */
164    public int getProfileStartTime() {
165        return profileStartTime;
166    }
167
168    /**
169     * @return start time of the profile segment as {@link MinsTime}
170     */
171    public MinsTime getProfileProcessedStartTime() {
172        return profileProcessedStartTime;
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * @return basal rate of the profile segment in milliunits.
177     * See {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.InsulinUnit#from1000To1(Long)} to convert
178     * to a displayable value.
179     */
180    public int getProfileBasalRate() {
181        return profileBasalRate;
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * @return carb ratio, expressed in 1000-increments. A carb ratio of 5g:1u is expressed as '5000',
186     * a carb ratio of 10g:1u is expressed as '10000', etc.
187     */
188    public long getProfileCarbRatio() {
189        return profileCarbRatio;
190    }
191
192    /**
193     * @return target BG in mg/dL used for corrections
194     */
195    public int getProfileTargetBG() {
196        return profileTargetBG;
197    }
198
199    /**
200     * @return insulin sensitivity factor. A "correction factor" of 1u:30mg/dL is expressed as '30'.
201     */
202    public int getProfileISF() {
203        return profileISF;
204    }
205    public int getIdpStatusId() {
206        return idpStatusId;
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * @return which fields in the time segment are filled out
211     */
212    public Set<IDPSegmentStatus> getIdpStatus() {
213        return IDPSegmentStatus.fromBitmask(idpStatusId);
214    }
215
216
217    public enum IDPSegmentStatus {
218        BASAL_RATE(1),
219        CARB_RATIO(2),
220        TARGET_BG(4),
221        CORRECTION_FACTOR(8),
222        START_TIME(16),
223        ;
224
225        private final int id;
226        IDPSegmentStatus(int id) {
227            this.id = id;
228        }
229
230        public int getId() {
231            return id;
232        }
233
234        public static Set<IDPSegmentStatus> fromBitmask(int mask) {
235            Set<IDPSegmentStatus> items = new HashSet<>();
236            for (IDPSegmentStatus status : values()) {
237                if ((mask & status.getId()) != 0) {
238                    items.add(status);
239                }
240            }
241
242            return items;
243        }
244
245        public static int toBitmask(IDPSegmentStatus ...items) {
246            int mask = 0;
247            for (IDPSegmentStatus item : items) {
248                mask += item.getId();
249            }
250            return mask;
251        }
252    }
253    
254}
